item.title: Act fast: Fly Delta to Dublin, Madrid and Marrakech from 26K SkyMiles each way
item.description: Delta Air Lines is offering 20% off SkyMiles award travel to transatlantic destinations including Amsterdam, Barcelona, Madrid and Marrakech.

item.title: Deal of the day: Fly nonstop coast-to-coast from only 12,400 Delta SkyMiles
item.description: Book nonstop transcontinental flights on Delta Air Lines starting at just 12,400 SkyMiles each way. Find award availability between JFK, BOS, LAX, SFO...

item.title: Tipping on a cruise: What to know about cruise ship gratuities
item.description: Everything you need to know about tipping and service charge policies at major cruise lines.

item.title: Earn up to 28,000 World of Hyatt points with this new promotion
item.description: World of Hyatt's "Bonus Journeys" promotion is back, and members can earn up to 28,000 points.

item.title: The St. Regis Singapore had a glow up: Here's what changed (and what didn't)
item.description: Here's everything that's new at The St. Regis Singapore following a significant remodel.
